div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxo
die Octobris Anno quo Supra

the saide day the Counsale and diuers' of the communite warnit
be the handbell and gathereit for the tyme consentit and ordanit
that Alexander menyes aldirman sal charge sere Jonhne ruthirfurd
aldirman of certane yeris bigane of the common' gudis of the said'
burghe in the yeris that he buyrit office befor the Auditoris chosin
and Suorne tharto Excepe the grissomes' and gudis assignit to
Sanct nicholes werk of the quhilkis the Auditouris hes nay
pouer' to tak nor' her' covnt

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem penultimo
die Octobris anno quo supra

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem Curie quod cristina
smytht est legitima et propinquior heres quondam Andree smitht
burgensis huius burgj patris suj et cetera

The secunde day of Nouember' the yer forsaid' Johne leslie
of warderis and thomas leslie coniunctlie and Seuerale become
dettoris to Alexander menyes aldirman and Alexander Rede mastir of the kirk
werk for tra barrellis of Salmond' lent to Johne of mar'
to be pait at the next new fishingis be witsonday or
Sonar' quhen euer It nedis to furnys' the said' werk
be the fathtis of thar bodiis Ande the saide Johne oblist him
be the fatht of his bodie to freithe and Releyve his said' dettouris
of the said' Salmond'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem quinto
die Nouembris anno quo supra

the saide day Jonhne litstar youngar grantit him borghe to
Jonhne andirsone for xvj s' for ane hors' maile for
Johne kirland' quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to
pay within terme of law

Eodem die gilbertus Tulideff et Donaldus baxter
amerciantur per confessionem propriam pro fractione communis
ordinacionis in fendo panes contra assisam et
sibi daret et cetera

The said day the Counsaile and communite warnit be the hand
bell throue the haill towne' and gatherit representand the body
of the towne' for the tyme' circualy Inquerit be Williame
scrimgeour officiar consensit grantit and ordanit ale thar grissumez
of thar wateris fischeingis and landis of this assedacioun' to be
maid to be gevin to the bigin of sanct nicholes' werk naman
sayand the contrar'

The said day Robert blinsele Alexander Chawmer Johnne' of
Cullane Alexander Reid Johne' Wormet Johne lesly of warderis
and Androw cullane was chosin and suorn' the gret aitht to
heir se consider and vnderstand the Compt of ser Johnne
Ruthirfurde of the commond gudis of the said burght' in his office
of Aldermanschip and tile allow and dissalow eftir thar Aithez'

The saide day the Alderman and baillies ordand Williame
smitht to find souerte that the gudis gevin in bill be Williame
Wormet clamit of airschip to pertene to thomas hay be deces'
of vmquhile Ellene mureson' his modir be furthtcumand
to the said thomas or ony vtheris that has Richt to the said
gudis or ellis the said gudis to be put in ane stringeable'
mannis handis to be Respounsale to thame havand richt
tharto

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene' tenta in pretorio eiusdem
octauo die mensis Nouembris anno quo supra

The said day the Alderman in the townis name' chargit
thomas lesly Johne' of mar Richerd Waus and William Wormet
James collisone' and Androw Cullane' baillies of thir tua yeris
bigane' to bring the haile acquittance of the said burght
betuix this and mononday and comper the said mononday to mak
the said towne' free

The said day the aldirman in the townis name' ordand ordanit
ale that has commone' seillis of the said burght to bring and present
thame' befor the towne' one mononday nixt tocum that thai mycht
awis' with the keping and obseruing of the samyn according to resson'

The said day Johnne' kirkland grantit to freitht and
kep Johne' litster skathles anent xvj schillingis at the
handis of Johne andersoun' for his hors' maile quhilkis
the baillies chargit to pay within terme' of law

The said day It was statut and ordanit be the Alderman
and counsaile that ale baxtaris within this burght sall baik
tua d' breid gud clene' fresche and weile bakin contening
xxxvj vnce' for tua d' and and penny breid xviij vnce
the quhilk pais' the baxtaris grantit to fulfill and kep

The saide day the aldirman and baillies ordanit William scrimgeour'
officiar to warne Johne greg to comper one mononday nixt tocum
befor thame to the ansuer to the borght strekit one him be Androw
litstar for the wrangwis' withhaldin fra him of ix pundis
xix schillingis and x d' as in the samyn gevin in writ
mair fullely is contenit

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem ixo die
nouembris anno quo supra

the saide day the Cordonaris consentit and grantit that tua mene
of thar' craft suld' be chosin be the tone to force and consider
the werk of thar' craft anys Ilkan oulk and to Set the said'
werk eftir the price of the hidis and the Stuff beis bocht for the
common' profit of the tone And' quhar' thai fynd ony vnsufficient
Stuff to present It to the aldirman and balyeis to be correkit
And' thar eftir Androw michelsone and Jonhe of grene war chosin
and Suorne the gret aithe to force the said' werk oulkly as
said' is Induring this yer'

The saide day It was Statut and ordanit be the aldirman ande
Counsal present for the gude and common profit of the tovne that nay
broustar fre / nor vnfre sal sell ayle vnto the tyme the
Cunnaris tast it and Set it eftir thar aithis and al fre broustaris
sal brew gude provabile ayle for viij d' the gallon' and vnfre
the gallon for vj d' and gif it be nocht of sic availe to be sellit
of the price that the Cunnaris settis it Ande that thai sal nocht by victall
quhil tym' lauchfule of day and hous' nayn' vndir the pane of brekin of
commoun' ordinance

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xv
die Nouembris Anno quo Supra

Eodem die compertum fuit per legittimam Inquisicionem Curie
quod Dauid prat est legitimus propinquior heres quondam Dauid
Prat patris sui Ideo datum fuit in mandatis ballivis ad cognoscendum
Ipsum ad terras et annuos Redditus In quibus dictus quondam pater
suus Obiit vltra vestitus et Sasitus ad pacem et fidem domini
nostri Regis ut de feodo et cetera

The said' day Johne greg lauchfullie warnit callit and nocht
comperit to ansuer' an to the borghe strekit one him be androw
litstar for the wranguys' haldin fra him of ix li' xix s'
and x d' tharfor the aldirman and balyeis ordanit William scrimgeor'
seriand to warne the said' Johne to Comper befor tham one friday
that next cumis to her' and se quhat day of law suld' be assignit
to him to ansuer to the said' borghe

head.foreign: productio littarum sub Sigillo communi huius burgi

div.p:
the said' day thir personis vndir writin hes producit and Schevin
thir lettres Selit vndir the commone Sele of this burghe In the first
Alexander menyes aldirman ane letter of the tak of the landis of Schethosley
bogferlow ane letter of the tak of the Smale Customes and ane
commission' of the Samyn offering the Copy tharof tile ony that desiris
Androw Cullane his letteris of takis and commission' of ane demi nethis
fischingis ane yer' of the Raik and Ane vthir of Done and thomas
chapman his lettres of assedacioun of ane demi nethis of the furdis
and ane commission' tharapon' Androw murray his lettres of the fischingis
of the crovis and of the demi of Schethoysley and the commission' tharapon'
Johne Auchneyve his letter of tak and commission' of his demi nethis
of the mydchingill And' Richard' Waus ane letter vndir the common'
Sele of iiijxx li'

the said day It was deliuerit and ordanit be ane Suorne assis'
William blinsele forspekar that thai suld' ger' warne ser Johne
ruthirfurd' aldirman of the yer' bigane and the balyeis of the saide yer'
to friday that next Cumis to se quhay Intrometit with the
kingis malys to the frethin of the tone

the saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' William
blinsele forspekar that cristiane Smitht sal gewe in hir gudis
of ayrschipe quhilkis Scho clamys in with one friday that
next cumis and ordanit Williame smitht to comper the saide day
and Ansuer' to the said' cristiane and to bring hir witnes the said'
day and Richtis quhilkis he hes and will vys'

div.head: Nomina Inquisitoris Cristine Smytht
div.p:
Johannes leslie gilbertus menyes Johannes wormet Alexander mar' Andreas murray
Willelmus blinsele Andreas Cullane Robertus crag Willelmus futhes Johannes Retre Johannes Kyntor
Dauid murray Willelmus murray burgenses dicti burgi Jurati dicunt quod quondam Andreas
Smytht frater cristine latoris presencium Obiit vltra vestitus et Sasitus ut de feodo
ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de duabus terris sine tenementis collatis
Jacentibus in futy inter terram thome chapman ex australi ex vna et terram thome
talyour' ex boreali partibus ab altera et communionem viam Regiam versus
oriens et maris fluxum versus occidens Et quod dicta cristina
est legitima et propinquia heres dicti quondam Andree fratris suj de dictis
terris sine tenementis cum suis pertinencijs Et quod est legitime etatis
Et quod dicte terre valent nunc per annum xx s' et valuerunt
xiij s' et iij d' tempore patris Et quod tenentur in capite de
Suppremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et nunc existunt
In manibus domini nostri Regis per Spacium vnius anni aut eocirca
per mortem dicti quondam Andree fratris suj In defectu verj
heredis Jus suum hucusue hucusque minime prosequentis datum et Clausis

Eodem die Willelmus belty fecit constituit creauit nominauit
et ordinauit Johannem Arthour suum procuratorem in prosequendum
exigendum et Recipiendum a Dauid Kintor vnum scutum gallicum
le franche crowne' et de Receptis acquitandis agendis defendendis
Promittendis de Rato et grat grato in vberiore forma procuratorij cum ceteris
clausulis necessariis oportinus

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xixo
die mensis Nouembris anno quo Supra

head.add: the malys aving' to Sanct nicholes werk of the termes bigan

div.p:
The said' day thir personis eftir folloing' grantit thame
awing' to Sanct nicholes werk thir Somez off
Salmond' and Siluer vndir writin In the first Alexander
Rede grantit him avand' sex barrellis of Salmond' of the termes
bigan and of this last martymes terme bipassit gilbert menyes gravntit him
aving' Sex barrelis of Salmond' of his male of the termes bigan William
Kintor grantit him aving' fyve barrellis Salmond' and xiij s' iiij d'
watter malys of the termes bigan Dauy Kintor grantit him aving to
the said' kirk werk four' barrellis of Salmond' of the termes bigan and
ser Jonhne ruthirfurd' grantit him aving' to the said' werk ane barrell of
Salmond' and xiij s' and iiij d' for iiij merkis resat fra gilbert Cullan henry
Rede grantit him aving tua barrellis of Salmond' to the said werk
and v s' pait of his Witsonday maile next to Cum the watter maile
quhilkis vmquhile Ellene mureson' hed' in assedacioun occupeit be
Duncan smitht is aving' to the said' kirk work of ane auchtan parte of
the Crovis extending to
Johne Wormet grantit him aving' to the said' werk sex barrellis salmond'
of his watter malys of the termes bigan Richard' Waus grantit him aving
thre barrellis salmond' of the sondaye fische of the yer' bigane Ande the
saide Richard' and William Wormet grantis tham aving thre barrelis Salmond'
for the sonday and haly dais fische to be brukit be tham quhile Sanct
Nicholes day next to Cum

the said' day the aldirman and balyeis assignit Johne greg this day xv dais
the thrid' day of the monetht of december' next to cum to ansuer'
to the borghe' fundin apone him be Androw litstar for the wrang
uys' withhaldin fra him of ix li' xix s' and x d' be gude estimacion
for the Costis and expensis maid' and Sustenit be him in the persevit
of ane pip of wad' as in the said' borghe gevin in writ mor'
fullie is contenit Ande thai discernit the Copy of the said' borghe to the saide
Johne

the said' day comperit William murray and schew that ser Johne Ruthir
furd' clamit him of certane Salmond' tharfor he offerit him Redy
furthtwith to vndirly the determinacion of ane assis' Anent ony
Salmond' or girls' that mycht be follouit or clamit be the said' knicht
befor the said' balyeis his Juge ordinar

the said' day Robert hay grantit him aving' to gilbert litstar
xj s' for borrowgang' quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay
within terme of law

The saide day comperit Jonhne grig and oppinly declarit ande
Schew that thomas leslie tuk neuir nor Rest neuire nay flour'
fra him Ande that he hed' nathir accioun' nor' caus' to the said'
thomas nor nay thing' to say to him bot gude

the saide day the borghe' strekit one thomas Narne be Androw
Watsone was of nane of vale be ane Suorne assis' patry
leslie forspekar for the wranguys' haldin fra him of ij Rynsche gutht
lingis

The said day the baillies assignit this day xv dais to Dauid
Kintor tile ansuer to the borght strekit one him be Johnne arthour
in the name' ande behalf of Williame belty for the wrangwis'
withhalding fra the said William of ane franche crowne

the said' day the tone feit Jonhne mason' to be continuale seruand' to tham
in thar' common' kirk werk for ane yer' enterand' tharto the xxij day
of this Instant nouember' for xvj merkis in the yer' Ande the saide Johne
Sueir' the gret aithe to be leill and trew in his seruice to the tone

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxij die nouembris
anno quo supra

the said' day ser William mvreson' Curat of abirdene and forspekar
to Jonhne Spens askit nay thingis at the Inquest for this day
bot to knaw gif he be nerrast and lauchfull ayr' to vmquhill
Dauy Spens' his fadir brothir

div.head: Nomina ad Inquisicionem Johannis Spens
div.p:
gilbertus menyes Johannes Collisone Andreas Cullane Duncanus colison
patricius leslie patricius Rede Willelmus andirsone patricius chernsid'
thomas Watsone Alexander chamer in Schipraw Johannes Auchneyve
Andreas Stevinsone and Dauid mar' burgenses dicti burgi Jurati dicunt
quod quondam Dauid Spens patruus Johannis Spens latoris presencium
Obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis
Et quod dictus Johannes est legitimus et propinquior heres dicti quondam dauid'
patruj suj

the said' day It was fundin and deliuerit be the saide assis' with the
avys' ande Informacioun of the Smythtis best and worthiast of
the tone that cristiane Smitht Sistir and ayr' to vmquhile Androw
smytht aw to haue thir gudis of ayrschipe In the first ane gret
Styddy and ame ane smale Stedy ane forhammir' with ane hand'
hammir' ane gret tayngis and ane Small tangis ane par off
Schoing lvmys that Is a boytour' a turches a schoing' kniff
I Schoing hammir' ane par of bellys' ane gret nayldaill
and ane litill ane Suerd' Ande the best and Secondast of
alle Instrumentis pertening to his Craft

The said' day the aldirman and ballieis assignit friday that next
cumis to Johne moir' to bring his resonnis richtis and allega
cionis quhilkis he has and will vys' quharfor' cristiane
Smytht suld' nocht be ayr to vmquhile mariory
hir modir

head.foreign: littere assedacionis Andree murray de terris dictis de Schethosley

div.p:
the said' day Androw murray producit his letter of assedacion'
vndir the common Sele' of demi landis of Schethosley
for xix yeris male fre the dat' xxv day of August
the yer' of god' IM iiijC and Nynty yeris his entre tharto
at the Witsonday nixt thareftir
